channel.title: Help with atacking str
channel.description:
Hi how do i make it when i wild a whip it can alway hit 135
? so it will never hit over 135 or under soo it always hit 135 on people
thankes help

item.title: Help with atacking str
item.dc:creator: @frugoo_scape frugoo scape
item.description:
@frugoo_scape wrote:

[quote=“Devildreams54, post:1, topic:160729”]Hi how do i make it when i wild a whip it can alway hit 135

? so it will never hit over 135 or under soo it always hit 135 on people

thankes help[/quote]
Go under the attack void and make an if statement that says you hit 135.
if(playerEquipment[3]==WhipItemId){hitdef=135;}
Make sure you put that after it generated your hit.

I’m not sure that the variables that i have provided you with, will work with your server.

Read full topic
